radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic parenchyma appears coarsened; smooth liver contour; no focal liver mass or ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measures 6 mm; several stones in gallbladder lumen without cholecystitis; pancreas shows decreased echogenicity suggestive of edema; no focal lesion in pancreas; normal spleen echogenicity; right kidney measures 13.1 cm, left kidney measures 13.7 cm with no hydronephrosis; post TIPS flow with reduced velocities compared to prior study.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Doppler evaluation shows decreased velocities compared to prior study.
